item.title: Smoked Turkey
item.description: Turkey, smoked on a charcoal grill ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 120 min üç≥ Cook time: 90-180 min üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 4 4-15 Ingredients 1 turkey, 5-15 lb. (thawed) 1-2 cups whipped butter (room temperature) 2 cup chicken broth 1-4 tbsp garlic powder (optional) 1 lb mixed vegetables (carrots, potatoes, broccoli, etc.) (optional) Directions Mix garlic powder into the whipped butter. Remove giblets and other materials from the turkey cavity.
